short_summary: The contractor shall be responsible for a raking and repointing of the mortar joints, removing and replacing existing stone as required and performing concrete repairs as required within the masonry of the Fort Henry Redoubt Block 1, 2 & 11.
description: Parks Canada requires services of a qualified contractor to provide masonry services to renew and repair masonry at Fort Henry Redoubt Blocks 1, 2 & 11. The scope of the project entails full rake out and repointing of the mortar joints, repair/ replacement of existing stone as necessary and performing concrete repairs as required within the heritage masonry fabric of Fort Henry Redoubt Block 1, 2 & 11. This project also entails the removal, cleaning, painting and repairing, as required, of the windows, doors, and metal work.
tags: Wood and Metal Joinery and Carpentry
